data.text: Ngʼama paro joma ok nyal en jahawi;
Jehova Nyasaye biro rite kendo biro miyo obed mangima;
Jehova Nyasaye biro rite e kitandane mar tuo midekre
Ne awacho niya, “Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kecha;
Wasika wuoyo kuoma ka chunygi rach koda, kagiwacho niya,
Sa asaya ma ngʼato obiro nena,
Wasika duto kuodho wach kuoma kaachiel kaka ginyalo hinya,
Koda ka osiepna mane ageno kuome,
To in, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, yie ikecha;
Pak ne Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasach Israel,
